The bootpath shows that it is empty ("-Xbootclasspath:"). Did you define a non-
default bootpath on the launch config with an empty bootpath?

Thanks a lot.
I had to use non-default bootpath and after that it's begin work. It's now said 
in console:  Couldn't find jdwp.dll, but that's seems easer.

Besides I think that in StandardVMDebugger better use connectThread.run() 
instead connectThread.start()
See API for Thread.start() - it calls the run method. Marking as "works for me".
